messages.title: 3 POSITIVE REASONS TO VOTE FOR MARK COOTE
messages.content: 1. Mark is committed to a free, improved NHS that is dedicated to patients. 2. Mark wants to protect our precious environment, campaigning against Government imposed housing quotas and inappropriate urban crabbing. 3. Mark has worked with our Police to make Cheltenham a safer place.

messages.title: A RECORD OF ACTION IN CHELTENHAM
messages.content: Mark Coote grew up here and now lives in the heart of Cheltenham. He has a track record of teaching and cancer charity work and hopes to dedicate his skills and knowledge for the benefit of everyone in our town.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Mark sees health care and NHS as his highest priority. He plans to cut NHS red-tape to get rid of waste first, and wants Conservative party to set NHS free from bureaucracy.

Mark spent more than 20 years as a secondary school teacher and now wants a chance for all Cheltenham's state schools. He believes teachers need more freedom to deliver lessons and parents should be able to set up their own schools.

Mark has championed local resident action groups across the town opposed to the imposition of thousands of homes by central Government and seeks to protect local environment through legislative proposals against what has become known as garden grabbing.

issues.environment: Mark has championed local resident action groups across the town opposed to the imposition of thousands of homes by central Government.
